subject: CONFIRMED: v1.14.8 category fix working, 6 practicas returned!
body:
## Confirmed Working

### Category Fix
- Before: category: "Event"
- After: category: "Practica" ✅

### Recurring Events Now Included
- Before: 1 practica returned
- After: 6 practicas returned ✅

### Waiting For
RRULE expansion so dates show occurrence within query range:
- Current: "Monday, July 14" (original startDate)
- Expected: "Monday, January 6" (occurrence in query range)

Once RRULE expansion is done, GPT instructions can be simplified - just display API data as-is.

-- Cronas
